title: Shanghai Lockdown Experiment Begins as Officials Race to Clear Covid-19
sub_head: Residents on one side of river dividing city are first to be confined at home; their neighbors on the opposite bank will follow
body:
Half of Shanghai went into lockdown on Monday, as authorities escalated measures to contain a spiraling Covid-19 outbreak in Chinaâ€™s financial capital.
After announcing the snap two-stage lockdown of the city on Sunday, Shanghai reported 3,500 new Covid-19 cases, another record, with the number of infections doubling every few days. On Monday, barricades were seen splitting up the city, while many metro services and bus lines were suspended. Companies including Tesla Inc. suspended manufacturing for four days.
